Description: Lower body sherd of North Ionian pottery bowl; interior: glazed black with traces of added white and red bands; exterior: part of wide black (fired streaky brown) band; reserved above and below; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The number 348 is written in ink on the exterior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIII, no. 347)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 672, no. 308)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.255)
